1.14.4.1.0:
- Added ability to make a panorama
- Added random selection of panorama on main screen
1.14.4.1.1:
- Added config to disable random panoramas.
- Added config to change panorama save folder
- Added panorama cache so they dont have to be loaded everytime the main menu is loaded

1.16.3.1.4.1:
- Add chat message on panorama creation
- Fix issue when player is moving

1.16.5.1.4.3:
- Fixed wrong text on flickering screen warning.
- Fix panorama location being in the players feet.
- Add zh_cn language (Thanks to @Wulian233).

1.19.1.5.0:
- Change panorama creation to prevent screen flickering.
- Add config option to set render resolution.
